content: post double front post double crochet 2 together crochet 3 together f2tog f3tog front post double front post treble_crochet crochet and front post and front post double treble_crochet together crochet together f and ftr decrease ftr and f decrease front post increases f3i front post increases f2i rightcross leftcross back post double back post crochet together increases b2i b2tog popcorn popcorn f crochet direction join b start join © tulip bag crochet by svetlana rogatykh 7 bottom of the bag foundation round 1 is worked in spirals with right side facing at all times do not join and do not turn at the end of these round foundation round 1 chain 57 double_crochet into 3rd chain from hook blue color on the chart = first left ch2 space 1 double_crochet in each chain to end of chain 55 double_crochet chain 2 blue color on the chart = first right ch2 space turn to continue crochet in spiral 1f around post of last double_crochet 1f around post of each double_crochet 55f ch2 = second left ch2 space turn to continue crochet in spiral 1f around post of each double_crochet 55f ch2 = second right ch2 space turn to continue crochet in spiral join with first f © tulip bag crochet by svetlana rogatykh 8 round 2 ch2 55f 3 double_crochet into first and second left ch2 space side by side and they become one 55f 3 double_crochet into first and second right ch2 space side by side and they become one join with first 55f per side 3dc per corner 116 stitches in total round 3 ch2 54f 2 f2i f 2 f2i 53f 2 f2i f f2i f around post of first f in the previous round join with first round 4 ch2 54f f2i f f2i 3f f2i f f2i 53f f2i f f2i 3f f2i f f around post of first f in the previous round join with first rs ws video © tulip bag crochet by svetlana rogatykh 9 side of the bag ● stitch counts for each round are listed at the end of the round in italics if a round does not list a stitch count there was no increase in that round so the stitch count is the same as the previous round round 5 ch2 1hdc 2f 1hdc f2tog around the same post in the base of half_double_crochet and next st 1f f2tog 1hdc into top of same st = 2nd leg st 2f 1hdc f2tog around the same post in the base of half_double_crochet and next st 1f f2tog 1hdc into top of same st 3 times 5 times 2f 1hdc f2tog around the same post in the base of half_double_crochet and next st 1f f2tog 1hdc into top of same st 2f 1hdc f2tog around the same post in the base of half_double_crochet and next st 1f f2tog 1hdc into top of same st 2 times f2tog around the same post in the base of half_double_crochet and next st 1f f2tog
